answers.answer: Hello,Most of the people suffering from diabetes develop fatty liver .There are few other medical conditions related to diabetes like obesity, high cholesterol and high blood pressure which can enhance the risk of nonalcoholic fatty liver disease. Fatty liver disease itself often causes no symptoms and is a benign condition. But in few rare cases it can increase your risk of developing liver inflammation or scarring, liver cancer and heart disease. Control your LDL bad cholesterol. Lose weight and achieve good control of your blood sugar. For more queries and concerns talk to your doctor. I hope it helps.Best wishes and regards!
